79| Martin Wheeler, Self Dr
1 Sett Knitting pins 6d |||6|

4| 1 peck Salt 5/- 1 ~ Copperas 1/6 ||6|6|

4| 1 Wool Hat 15/ ||15||

4| Fish dam Store PP accot rendd |9|9|3|
